Culinary Profile & Uses

1. Flavour and Form ‘Neon 5’ offers the quintessential sweet and earthy flavour of a premium Nantes carrot, with a crisp, snappy texture and no woody core. The roots are slender, perfectly cylindrical, and grow in a stunning array of colours: Deep Purple skin with an orange core, Sunshine Yellow, Crimson Red, Lunar White, and Classic Orange. The foliage is a manageable, lacy green tuft, ideal for dense planting in shallow soil volumes.

2. The Colourful Crunch This carrot’s visual drama and classic flavour make it incredibly versatile for fresh and lightly cooked applications.

  • Rainbow Crudité & Snacking: The ultimate show-stopping vegetable platter centerpiece. Each colour offers a slightly different phytonutrient profile and a visually stunning, sweet crunch for fresh eating.
  • Vibrant Salads & Slaws: Shaved, grated, or spiralized to add a burst of colour and sweet, earthy flavour to salads and slaws. The different colours retain their hues when raw.
  • Roasted Medleys: Tossed whole with olive oil and herbs, they roast quickly, caramelizing their natural sugars while creating a beautiful, multi-coloured side dish.
  • Pickled Jewels: Their small size and firm texture make them perfect for pickling, creating a vibrant and tasty refrigerator pickle.

3. The Harvest and Yield ‘Neon 5’ is a rapid-maturing, uniform cultivar. The entire bunch can be harvested in one go, typically by gently loosening the soil and pulling the entire plant. Supplied as an RFID seed tape, a single planting provides a dense and colourful yield of 8-12 petite, coreless roots per cluster, ready for harvest in a remarkably fast 50-55 days from sowing.
